title: Mahshi (Stuffed Vegetables)
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Wash the tomatoes and cut off the top part, then scoop out the contents with a spoon, and keep the seeds and pulp.
Mix the rice, onion, parsley, mint, seeds, and pulp together.
Stuff the tomatoes with the mixture and place them in a large pot.
Add water, oil, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper (if using) and let them simmer on low heat for 30 minutes until the tomatoes and rice are cooked.
Serve the mahshi hot with your favorite sauce.
